divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were sitting on our back patio when my wife said their is a big bird ...no wait that is not a bird what is that and that is when I turned around and saw the object and then that is when I said that is not a plane...it has no lights and is not making any noise we watched it as it continued with the same speed. I did not want to take my eyes off it to run for a camera as I was in awe. I thought to my self someone else has to see this, I was so sure that someone else seen it that I watched the news to see if it had been reported but a big disappointment a big no.that is what surprised me most because it seemed to be the size of a bus. My wife and I watched this until we could no longer see it which was between 2 and three minutes.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around July 7th 2013
Summary: black upside down pine tree with one large sizebox shape connected to it and one small box
